DESCRIPTION: Our timelessly chic Barolo leather swivel chairs feature a classic yet versatile silhouette that fits effortlessly into almost any room. This low-profile barrel seat is wrapped in glove soft leather, offering 360-degree swivel action to allow for quick pivots in any direction. Bold decorative stitching elevates this chair to the next level, securing its place as a tried and true staple piece in your living space. Available in seven gorgeous classic leather colors.

FEATURES1: Plush, generously sized swivel chair creates a cozy, welcoming spot in any room., Oversized design delivers expansive comfort., 360-degree swivel feature lets chair face any direction., Exquisitely tailored and upholstered in a durable, 100-percent polyester fabric with rich textural dimension and softness., Pillows and seat cushions are encased in cotton, down-proof channeled ticking to help them keep their shape and prevent feather migration, Seat cushions are padded with high-density Dacron and topped with sterilized down and feathers for maximum plushness, Chair frames feature no-sag springs and high-density webbing for long-lasting support, Wood frames feature reinforced corner blocks for lasting strength and stability, Select woods are kiln-dried to minimize warping and splitting while ensuring longevity
DESCRIPTION: Dreamy comfort awaits with the Boomer oversized swivel chair. Comfy and cozy, its generous proportions are ideal for snuggling and nestling deep for relaxation. Boomer has a 360-degree swivel base so you can face any direction and is available in luxuriously textured fabric options.

DESCRIPTION: Our timelessly chic Barolo leather swivel chairs feature a classic yet versatile silhouette that fits effortlessly into almost any room. This low-profile barrel seat is wrapped in glove soft leather, offering 360-degree swivel action to allow for quick pivots in any direction. Bold decorative stitching elevates this chair to the next level, securing its place as a tried and true staple piece in your living space. Available in seven gorgeous classic leather colors.

DESCRIPTION: The Austin power recliner is designed for ultimate comfort and convenience. It features independently operating power headrests and is upholstered in supple leather with a custom match. The modern high-leg design in a warm walnut finish gives it a contemporary look. The power recline switch includes USB and USB-C ports, as well as a "home" button to bring all positions back to an upright position. It is also ready to mount any FreeMotion® bracket and battery for cordless operation easily.

DESCRIPTION: Nexus provides comfortable seating with zero-gravity power recline, lumbar support, and an independent power headrest for personalized relaxation. DESCRIPTION: Penfield offers a remote control for a zero-gravity recline, power headrest, lumbar support, and heat and massage features for added relaxation. Made from durable and soft 100% polyester fabric, the Penfield has stylish two-tiered track arms. The sofa includes a drop-down table with lights, a pop-up power station, cup holders, and a Bluetooth speaker. The loveseat features a console with stainless steel cup holders and a power station. With comfortable bucket seats, the Penfield combines style and technology for a modern look for the home.

DESCRIPTION: Oversized features, neutral coloring, and a faux-leather look and feel converge to create a strong, masculine aesthetic for Theon. Theon's contoured bucket-style seats combine with generously-stuffed plush arms and a bustle-back pillow headrest forfull body-conforming comfort. Soft contour lines of the piece offset some of the hardier design elements. No matter where it is placed or how often it is used, Theon offers a remarkable value-driven solution to relaxation.

DESCRIPTION: Oversized features, neutral coloring, and a faux-leather look and feel converge to create a strong, masculine aesthetic for Theon. DESCRIPTION: Alpine is the modern yet comfortable seating solution you have been looking for. Featuring a zero-gravity power recline, Alpine allows you to relax in the perfect position while the power headrest adjusts for added neck support. The tilt console hides stainless steel cupholders and has a 3-way wireless charger for earbuds, smartwatches, and smartphones. It also houses USB and USB-C ports and lift-top storage for extra convenience. Alpine is designed for a modern lifestyle and easily fits any FreeMotion® bracket and battery for cordless use.

DESCRIPTION: The essence of understated elegance, Pure Modern brings dramatic character to today’s living spaces. Its crisp lines and clean geometric profiles are highlighted with a signature Moonstone finish—a sophisticated warm grey revealing oak veneer patterns—and Burnished Nickel hardware. Seductive in its simplicity, the bold presence of Pure Modern elevates the allure of any space.

DESCRIPTION: Like an explosion of beauty, the Big Bang multifunctional console creates a captivating centerpiece for any room. Its classic black and white color palette feels fresh and modern while its door-front designs convey organic luxe.

FEATURES1: Console doors are distinguished by an embossed hexagon motif in a warm bronze finish, Crafted from solid mango for a unique aesthetic with natural variations of color, wood grain and knots, Handcrafted by artisans for authentic, global-inspired character, Four doors open to reveal two generous storage compartments and removable interior shelves, Multifunctional console design works as a TV console, buffet, credenza or in any space you need stylish storage, Slots in back panel designed for ventilation and cord management, Each artisanal piece is unique, so colors and patterns vary slightly based on natural materials, Concealed storage keeps clutter out of sight
DESCRIPTION: Relaxed meets refined in the chic character of the Cairo multifunctional console. Its distinctive door panels feature an eye-catching pattern of embossed hexagons accentuated in a bronze metal finish. Cairo adds an element of warmth to the room and is destined to be a topic of conversation.
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Relaxed meets refined in the chic character of the Cairo multifunctional console. Its distinctive door panels feature an eye-catching pattern of embossed hexagons accentuated in a bronze metal finish. Cairo adds an element of warmth to the room and is destined to be a topic of conversation.

FEATURES1: Console doors feature a mosaic of bone inlay in circular patterns and the colors of sand and sea, Crafted from solid mango for a unique aesthetic with natural variations of color, wood grain and knots, Handcrafted by artisans for authentic, global-inspired character, Four touch-latch doors open to reveal two generous storage compartments and removable interior shelves, Multifunctional console design works as a TV console, buffet, credenza or in any space you need stylish storage, Slots in back panel designed for ventilation and cord management, Each artisanal piece is unique, so colors and patterns vary slightly based on natural materials, Concealed storage keeps clutter out of sight
DESCRIPTION: Impressive from every angle, the Chaka multifunctional console adds bold style to a space. Its tribal-inspired motif features hand-applied bone inlay in contrasting shades of light and dark. A plinth base and deep black finish give this console its handsome presence.
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Impressive from every angle, the Chaka multifunctional console adds bold style to a space. Its tribal-inspired motif features hand-applied bone inlay in contrasting shades of light and dark. A plinth base and deep black finish give this console its handsome presence.
